code: import React from"react";import caterImg from"../images/pizza-footer-img.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Catering(){function caterAnimation(){var caterContainer=document.querySelector(".catering-container");var menuTop=document.getElementById("menu");var screenPosition=window.innerHeight;var bodyHeight=menuTop.getBoundingClientRect().top;if(screenPosition>bodyHeight){caterContainer.style.display="block";}else{}}window.addEventListener('scroll',caterAnimation);function closeCater(){var caterContainer=document.querySelector(".catering-container");caterContainer.style.display="none";window.addEventListener('scroll',closeCater);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"catering-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-times",onClick:closeCater}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"cater-img",src:caterImg,alt:"pizza king catering"})]});}export default Catering;
